Title: Relates to an officer's notification of a homeowner's balance after a debt is paid in full
Summary: Relates to an officer's notification of a homeowner's balance after a debt is paid in full; provides that officers conducting a sale shall notify a homeowner of the balance in writing in a timely manner and shall clearly state that the debt is paid in full.
LawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to an officer's notification of a homeowner's balance after a debt is paid in full
